about.description:
rosmake is a ros dependency aware build tool which can be used to build all
dependencies in the correct order.
about.summary: rosmake is a ros dependency aware build tool which can be used to build all dependencies in the

commands: export ROS_ROOT=$PREFIX && python -c "import rospkg;s = rospkg.RosPack();ret = s.get_path('rosmake');print(ret)"
export ROS_ROOT=$PREFIX && python -c "import rospkg;s = rospkg.RosPack();ret = s.get_path('rosmake');print(ret)"
export ROS_ROOT=$PREFIX && python -c "import rospkg;s = rospkg.RosPack();ret = s.get_path('rosmake');print(ret)"

name: ros-rosmake
raw_meta_yaml:
package:
  name: ros-rosmake
  version: 1.14.6

source:
  url: https://github.com/ros-gbp/ros-release/archive/release/melodic/rosmake/1.14.6-0.tar.gz
  fn: ros-rosmake-1.14.6.tar.gz
  sha256: 2014461723eb619c99a70d3314a6e392e922a27d17fc9bc5a83292c8dfd0d591
  patches:

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - cmake
    - make  # [unix]
  host:
    - ros-conda-mutex * melodic
    - ros-conda-base
    - python
    - catkin_pkg
    - ros-catkin
  run:
    - ros-conda-mutex * melodic
    - ros-conda-base
    - ros-catkin
    - rospkg
    - python

test:
  requires:
    - rospkg
  commands:
    - export ROS_ROOT=$PREFIX && python -c "import rospkg;s = rospkg.RosPack();ret = s.get_path('rosmake');print(ret)"

about:
  home: http://ros.org/wiki/rosmake
  summary: |
    rosmake is a ros dependency aware build tool which can be used to build all dependencies in the
  description: |
    rosmake is a ros dependency aware build tool which can be used to build all
    dependencies in the correct order.
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: src/rosmake/__init__.py

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - wolfv
    - lesteve
    - seanyen
